summary: Setting PATH variable to include CPLEX bin directory and enabling better exceptions for running Python script test_topo_check.py with additional flag -f. Alternative PyPI mirror site options provided.

details.comment: Setting PATH variable to include CPLEX bin directory and enabling better exceptions for running Python script test_topo_check.py with additional flag -f. Alternative PyPI mirror site options provided.
details.content:
env PATH="$PATH:/Applications/CPLEX_Studio1210/cplex/bin/x86-64_osx/" BETTER_EXCEPTIONS=1 python3 test_topo_check.py -f
# alternative pypi mirrow sites:
# - https://pypi.douban.com/simple
